cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing WNW through the northern Leeward Islands, forecast to move toward the Turks & Caicos and the Bahamas, then bend northwest toward South Florida late this weekend

weather_observation.watch_coast: None issued along U.S. mainland coastline as of Advisory 28A
weather_observation.warning_coast: None issued along U.S. mainland coastline as of Advisory 28A
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, Haiti, Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, Cuba, and eventually Florida peninsula
weather_observation.wind: Low (â‰¤ 8% chance of 34-kt winds within five days; near-zero chance of 50-kt)
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall signal for coastal Georgia within the 5-day forecast
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and rip currents may develop along the Georgia coast late in the period even if the center remains south of the area
